title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
plot: A woman finds herself between life and death in a library of alternate choices, exploring the lives she could have lived.

title: Pachinko
author: Min Jin Lee
plot: A sweeping family saga following four generations of a Korean family living in Japan, exploring identity and survival.

title: The Shadow of the Wind
author: Carlos Ruiz Zaf√≥n
plot: A hidden book leads a young reader into a web of secrets across post-war Barcelona.

title: The Night Circus
author: Erin Morgenstern
plot: Two magicians bound in a lifelong competition build a dreamlike circus that captivates a city.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
plot: A lone astronaut wakes up light-years from Earth with one mission: save humanity.

title: The Vanishing Half
author: Brit Bennett
plot: Twin sisters choose different paths that ripple through generations of their family.

title: The Song of Achilles
author: Madeline Miller
plot: A lyrical retelling of the Iliad through the bond between Achilles and Patroclus.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
plot: Practical strategies for building good habits and breaking the bad ones.

title: Norwegian Wood
author: Haruki Murakami
plot: A tender coming-of-age story set against the backdrop of 1960s Tokyo.

title: The Paris Library
author: Janet Skeslien Charles
plot: A librarian's story of resistance and friendship in Paris during World War II.

title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
author: V.E. Schwab
plot: A woman cursed to be forgotten finds a chance at love and remembrance.

title: Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow
author: Gabrielle Zevin
plot: Two friends build a creative partnership while designing games and a life together.

title: The House in the Cerulean Sea
author: T.J. Klune
plot: A caseworker discovers a magical orphanage and a new way of belonging.
